title: Drawing, "Table"
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEWYORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions and materials; inscribed in graphite at lower left margin: 11; inscribed in graphite in lower right margin: SCALE 1 1/2"-1'0"/6333; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P.
description: Perspective drawing of a small table in upper right corner, plans and elevations in lower left. Rectangular table top with polished surface, four tubular metal legs curved inward and connect to two tubular metal beams/platforms at ground.
